text: The 2019–20 season will be Puskás Akadémia FC's 6th competitive season, 3rd consecutive season in the OTP Bank Liga and 8th year in existence as a football club. ==Transfers== ===Summer=== In: Out: ===Winter=== In: Out: Source: ==Nemzeti Bajnokság I== === League table === === Results summary === === Results by round === === Matches === ===Hungarian Cup=== ==Statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== :Last updated on 27 June 2020. |- |colspan="14"|Youth players: |- |colspan="14"|Out to loan: |- |colspan="14"|Players no longer at the club: |} ===Top scorers=== Includes all competitive matches.
